text:
Further more, Trump could lose the following according to the 
1958 Former Presidents Act:
1. Pension ($219,200/year as of 2020).
2. $150,000/year for office staff for first 30 months. $96,000/year thereafter.
3. Office space.
4. $20,000/year pension for president's widow.
5. $1,000,000/year for security & travel expenses + $500,000/year for spouse.
6. Excludes presidents impeached, convicted, & removed from office 🎯
